org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.external.stream

Class CameraStreamServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.external.stream.CameraStreamServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OpModeManagerNotifier.Notifications

    public class CameraStreamServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements OpModeManagerNotifier.Notifications
    Server for sending camera frames from the RC to the corresponding client on the DS. Frames are sent one at a time and can only be triggered with a DS request.
    See Also:
    CameraStreamClient
